sim_BM <- function(T_, delta) {
  tmesh <- seq(from = 0, to = T_, by = delta)
  N <- length(tmesh)
  step <- delta * T_
  Norm <- rnorm(N)
  B <- c(0, cumsum(sqrt(delta) * Norm[-N]))
  output <- data.frame(B = B, Norm = Norm)
  return(output)
}
